channel.title: Machine Learning on Katrien Antonio
channel.description: Recent content in Machine Learning on Katrien Antonio

item.title: Machine learning for insurance pricing
item.description: An overview of published and ongoing research papers within the machine learning for pricing research line developed in my lab. This research line puts focus on: data driven strategies to handle continuous and spatial risk factors tree-based machine learning techniques for pricing. Watch Roel Henckaerts presenting our paper on tree-based machine learning during UseR!2018 in Brisbane. A data driven binning strategy for the construction of insurance tariff classes Collaborators: Roel Henckaerts, Katrien Antonio, Maxime Clijsters and Roel Verbelen.
